CustomField.description: ADARA Traveler Value Score is based on a 360-degree view of customers’ behaviors and needs across the global travel ecosystem, over time. Activating ADARA Traveler Value Score in marketing, e-commerce, business intelligence and customer service is the first step to extract maximum lifetime customer value. See: https://adara.com/adara-traveler-value-score/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Score is based on a 360-degree view of customers’ behaviours and needs across the global travel ecosystem, over time.
CustomField.label: Traveler Value Score
